description: Search efforts continue for people trapped under collapsed buildings as the death toll rises to 31.
title: Turkey earthquake: At least 31 dead as buildings collapse
title_page: Turkey earthquake: At least 31 dead as buildings collapse - BBC News
maintext: Rescue teams worked through the night, using their hands, drills and diggers to try to find people in the rubble of fallen buildings. They also brought beds and tents for those displaced, and warned residents against returning to damaged buildings because of the danger of aftershocks.
